name: @stauffenbits/fourd
description: a web component dynamic multilevel graph visualization
author: Joshua M Moore <moore.joshua@pm.me>

scripts.github: npm run clean && npm run githubBuild && npm run publish
scripts.githubBuild: parcel build index.html --out-dir docs/ --public-url /fourd/ && cp doc/* docs/doc/. -r
scripts.publish: npm run commit && git push origin main
scripts.codesmith: npm run clean && npm run codesmithBuild && npm run codesmithDev
scripts.local: npm run clean && npm run localBuild && npm run localDev
